cosmos.question: I'm big and bright, and I shine at night. I give the Earth its light, what am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very hot
🌟 I am a giant ball of fire
🌞 The moon reflects my light

cosmos.question: I am round and I spin, you live here within. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 Many creatures live on me
💧 I have lots of water
🌎 I am your home

cosmos.question: I'm in the sky, sometimes I'm round, sometimes I'm not. Wolves howl at me a lot. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Some people think I am made of this
🌕 I change my shape every night
🐺 Werewolves love me

cosmos.question: I am red, I am a planet, and I am named after a god of war. What planet am I?

hints.text: 🍫 My color is that of rust
🚀 People might visit me one day
😡 A very angry god shares my name

cosmos.question: I am very big with rings around me. I am a planet. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My jewelry is made of ice and rocks
🪐 I am a gas giant
🌌 My rings are very prominent

cosmos.question: I am made of many stars and gas, a giant group of them all amassed. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I contain billions of stars
🌀 I'm often spiral-shaped
🥛 Our solar system is part of me

cosmos.question: I am a hot ball of gas far away, that looks very small during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔭 I appear as a tiny point of light
🔥 I am similar to our sun but much further away
🌌 There are billions of me in our galaxy

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of us are named after animals
✨ You can find me using a star chart
🏺Ancient Greeks and Romans gave me names

cosmos.question: I am a small, rocky object that orbits the Sun, but I am not a planet. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I can create shooting stars when I burn up
🪨 I am made of rock and metal
💥 Sometimes I hit the Earth and cause craters

cosmos.question: I am a giant cloud of gas and dust in space, where new stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I can be very colorful
👶 Stars start their lives inside me
🌌 I am like a cosmic nursery

bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I make honey. What am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I like to fly around flowers.
🍯 I live in a hive with my family.
🐝 I buzz when I fly.

bug.question: I am red with black spots, and I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am small and round.
🌱 Gardeners like me because I eat aphids.
⚫ I have dots on my back.

bug.question: I hop and jump and live in grassy fields. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am usually green.
🎶 I make a chirping sound.
🦵 I have strong legs for jumping.

bug.question: I march in lines and carry food. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I live in a colony.
💪 I am very strong for my size.
🍪 I love crumbs!

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then I go into a chrysalis, and then I have beautiful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I fly around and drink nectar.
🐛 I eat leaves when I am young.
🌈 I come in many colors.

bug.question: I sing at night in the summertime. What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I am a type of insect.
🌙 You hear me more than you see me.
🎵 My sound is called a chirp.

bug.question: I have eight legs and spin a sticky web. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I catch my food in my web.
🕷️ I am not an insect.
🏠 I live in the corner of your room (sometimes!).

bug.question: I light up at night. People put me in jars. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I glow.
💡 I am also called a lightning bug.
🌃 You can see me in the dark.

bug.question: I buzz loudly, and I bite and drink blood. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I can be very annoying.
💧 I need blood to lay my eggs.
🚫 People try to swat me away.

bug.question: I make a cozy home of silk. What am I before I fly away?

hints.text: 🏡 I'm cozy inside.
🦋 I transform inside.
🐛 I am not always a home builder!
